title: RUSSIAN CIRCLES Announces Final U.S. Gnosis Tour Dates Before Entering Studio For Their Ninth Album
description: Blackwater Holylight and Young Widows are set to opener. The post RUSSIAN CIRCLES Announces Final U.S. Gnosis Tour Dates Before Entering Studio For Their Ninth Album appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: Blackwater Holylight and Young Widows are set to opener.
text: Post-metal powerhouse Russian Circles are wrapping up the final chapter of their acclaimed Gnosis album cycle with a fresh round of U.S. tour dates set for late 2025. These newly announced shows will mark the band’s last live appearances before heading back into the studio to begin work on their highly anticipated ninth studio album. Joining Russian Circles on select dates will be Blackwater Holylight, known for their doom-psych fusion, and noise rock veterans Young Widows. Get your tickets here. "We will be playing the final Gnosis shows in the US before we begin our next album," wrote Russian Circles. "Delighted to have Blackwater Holylight joining us for the majority of the dates and our longtime tour mates Young Widows for the last two in Nashville and Chicago." Russian Circles & Blackwater Holylight 9/11 Detroit, MI Magic Stick9/12 Lakewood, OH The Roxy9/13 Columbus, OH The King of Clubs9/14 Pittsburgh, PA Spirit Hall9/16 Buffalo, NY Rec Room9/17 Allentown, PA Archer Music Hall9/19 Boston, MA Royale9/20 Philadelphia, PA Union Transfer9/21 Brooklyn, NY Warsaw9/22 Washington, DC 9:30 Club Russian Circles & Young Widows 9/24 Nashville, TN Mainstage at Eastside Bowl9/26 Chicago, IL Thalia Hall Want More Metal? html:
Post-metal powerhouse Russian Circles are wrapping up the final chapter of their acclaimed Gnosis album cycle with a fresh round of U.S. tour dates set for late 2025. These newly announced shows will mark the band’s last live appearances before heading back into the studio to begin work on their highly anticipated ninth studio album.

Joining Russian Circles on select dates will be Blackwater Holylight, known for their doom-psych fusion, and noise rock veterans Young Widows. Get your tickets here.

"We will be playing the final Gnosis shows in the US before we begin our next album," wrote Russian Circles. "Delighted to have Blackwater Holylight joining us for the majority of the dates and our longtime tour mates Young Widows for the last two in Nashville and Chicago."

Russian Circles & Blackwater Holylight

9/11 Detroit, MI Magic Stick
9/12 Lakewood, OH The Roxy
9/13 Columbus, OH The King of Clubs
9/14 Pittsburgh, PA Spirit Hall
9/16 Buffalo, NY Rec Room
9/17 Allentown, PA Archer Music Hall
9/19 Boston, MA Royale
9/20 Philadelphia, PA Union Transfer
9/21 Brooklyn, NY Warsaw
9/22 Washington, DC 9:30 Club

Russian Circles & Young Widows

9/24 Nashville, TN Mainstage at Eastside Bowl
9/26 Chicago, IL Thalia Hall
